author: lektran
msg: [CVE-2010-0432] Added an OFBiz specific FreeMarker TemplateExceptionHandler, ensures that any stack trace error messages are properly encoded before being dumped to the browser (or anywhere else).

author: lektran
msg: [CVE-2010-0432] Menu widget links of type hidden-form were not correctly encoding the value attribute.

author: tabish
msg: Fix a bunch of implicit type conversion warnings that show up under Visual C++ and GCC when you add the -Wconversion option.

author: rhuijben
msg: Update the adm crawler to just using the BASE_NODE information for
calculating update information. Recent commits (read: r919992), removed
the last few hurdles to make this possible.
(report_revisions_and_depths): Update to use only BASE_NODE where possible,
as we don't have to tell the server about local additions for updates.
Also switch to the normal scratch_pool pattern instead of also using a
